entry.title: Armenian PM meets Blinken, NATO head, Iranian president at UN

media:group.media:title: Armenian PM meets Blinken, NATO head, Iranian president at UN
media:group.media:description:
üìçArmenia‚Äôs Defense Ministry reported another ceasefire violation by Azerbaijan Friday morning, taking the total number of alleged violations by both sides this week to four. üìçA spokesperson for Armenia‚Äôs Foreign Minister said a meeting next month between Armenian Prime Minister Nikol Pashinyan and Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoƒüan ‚Äúcannot be ruled out‚Äù after Erdoƒüan raised the possibility. üìçCatholicos Karekin II convened a meeting at the Mother See of Holy Echmiadzin with Armenia‚Äôs first three presidents, Levon Ter-Petrossian, Robert Kocharyan and Serzh Sargsyan.

entry.title: Armenian banks may stop accepting Russia‚Äôs Mir payment system

media:group.media:title: Armenian banks may stop accepting Russia‚Äôs Mir payment system
media:group.media:description:
üìçArmenia‚Äôs Defense Ministry reported a second ceasefire violation by Azerbaijani troops Wednesday evening, leaving one person injured and marking Azerbaijan‚Äôs second alleged violation in the past two days. üìçAirline tickets from Russia to Armenia quickly sold out for the coming days, while prices surged many times over, after Russian President Vladimir Putin announced a ‚Äúpartial mobilization.‚Äù üìçCommercial banks in Armenia will decide for themselves on banning usage of the Russian "Mir" payment system, according to the Central Bank.
